list.name: Laden
list.rawQuery:
SELECT StartDate as time_sec,
concat('Laden: ', (select address from pos where pos.id = chargingstate.Pos), ' / ' , (select charging.charge_energy_added from charging where chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging.id), ' kWh') as text 
FROM chargingstate 
WHERE $__timeFilter(StartDate) and timestampdiff(MINUTE, StartDate, Enddate) > 5
order by StartDate desc

list.name: Laden fertig
list.rawQuery:
SELECT EndDate as time_sec,
concat('Laden fertig: ', (select address from pos where pos.id = chargingstate.Pos), ' / ' , (select charging.charge_energy_added from charging where chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging.id), ' kWh') as text 
FROM chargingstate 
 WHERE $__timeFilter(StartDate) and timestampdiff(MINUTE, StartDate, Enddate) > 5
order by StartDate desc

list.name: Schlafen
list.rawQuery:
SELECT StartDate as time_sec,
state as text 
FROM state
WHERE $__timeFilter(StartDate) and state = 'asleep'
order by StartDate desc

list.name: Online
list.rawQuery:
SELECT StartDate as time_sec,
state as text 
FROM state
WHERE $__timeFilter(StartDate) and state = 'online'
order by StartDate desc

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
 $__timeEpoch(datum),
 speed as kMh, 
 power as PS, 
 ideal_battery_range_km as 'Range km', 
 outside_temp as '°C',
 altitude as 'Höhe'
FROM
 pos
WHERE
 $__timeFilter(datum)
ORDER BY
 Datum ASC

SELECT
 avg(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(datum)) as time_sec,
 avg(lat) as lat,
 avg(lng) as lng
 FROM pos
WHERE $__timeFilter(datum)
group by UNIX_TIMESTAMP(datum) div least(300, greatest(10,($__interval_ms / 30000)))
ORDER BY datum ASC
